preference.name: ctm0FileNameSeparator
preference.preference_description: Sets the separator that is used in between the Revision ID and Item ID when creating file names for the files representing Content Management topics and graphics. Example: A$100123.xml. Note: This value should not be the same value used in any item ID, graphic name, or file name imported into Content Management. For example, the value "_" should not be used if a file is being imported as "engine_stand.xml".
